name: ScarCity
description:
Welcome to ScarCity.

They did it. The prohibition. We can't sell alcohol anymore. Finding Alcohol is now so difficult. And people still want some.

You had some hidden money and connections, allowing you to set a warehouse in town to receive some illegal goods. But now you have to deliver the goods to your bar and avoid th epolice to suspect you to have an illigal bar in your backroom.

Right click on warehouse to buy goods to your contacts.

Right click on bar to check what they need.

Right click on police station to bribe policemen and reduce their suspissions on your businness.

Hightlight a path from warehouse(s) to bar(s), and send marchandise.

Don't go under 5000$.
